mainText:
Hello Steve:
  I know you are tired enough and this is not a world you interest any more,
because you have already made us crazy than nobody else can do. But one
thing you must know , that is we love you and are pretty impressed by your
speech, your smartness and everything about you!!
  I do not know how to say something accurate to show my mood. I just wanna
say, thank you Steve, you are always and forever my mentor!
author: Zernike
